query:
UPDATE blog_posts SET coverImage = CASE 
  WHEN title LIKE '%I-76 Ice Crash%' THEN '/images/blog/i76-ice-crash.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Deer Strike%' THEN '/images/blog/deer-strike.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Snowstorm%' THEN '/images/blog/snowstorm-tree.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Hit-and-Run%' THEN '/images/blog/hit-and-run-fog.jpg'
END
WHERE title LIKE '%I-76%' OR title LIKE '%Deer Strike%' OR title LIKE '%Snowstorm%' OR title LIKE '%Hit-and-Run%'
command:

  WHEN title LIKE '%I-76 Ice Crash%' THEN '/images/blog/i76-ice-crash.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Deer Strike%' THEN '/images/blog/deer-strike.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Snowstorm%' THEN '/images/blog/snowstorm-tree.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Hit-and-Run%' THEN '/images/blog/hit-and-run-fog.jpg'

WHERE title LIKE '%I-76%' OR title LIKE '%Deer Strike%' OR title LIKE '%Snowstorm%' OR title LIKE '%Hit-and-Run%'
